scripts.lint: pnpm run license && eslint --fix --no-error-on-unmatched-pattern src/ test/
scripts.create: mkdir ./dist && clasp create --title rss-to-bluesky-social --type standard --rootDir ./dist && mv ./dist/.clasp.json ./.clasp.json
scripts.build: pnpm run clean && pnpm run bundle && ncp appsscript.json dist/appsscript.json
scripts.deploy: pnpm run lint && pnpm run test && pnpm run build && clasp push -f
